Installation
-----

```bash
$ npm install the-paint --save
```

<!-- Section from "doc/guides/02.Usage.md.hbs" Start -->

<a name="section-doc-guides-02-usage-md"></a>

Usage
---------

```javascript
'use strict'

import React from 'react'
import { ThePaint, ThePaintStyle } from 'the-paint'

class ExampleComponent extends React.Component {
  drawers = {}
  state = {
    snapshots: {}
  }
  clear = () => {
    for (const drawer of Object.values(this.drawers)) {
      drawer.clear()
    }
  }
  undo = async () => {
    const { snapshots } = this.state
    for (const [drawerId, drawer] of Object.entries(this.drawers)) {
      const snapshot = (snapshots[drawerId] || []).pop()
      if (!snapshot) {
        drawer.clear()
        continue
      }
      await drawer.fromSnapshot(snapshot)
    }
    this.setState({
      snapshots: { ...snapshots }
    })
  }

  onDrawStart = ({ snapshot, drawer }) => {
    console.log('Drawing started', { snapshot, drawer })
    this.drawers[drawer.id] = drawer
    const { snapshots } = this.state
    this.setState({
      snapshots: {
        ...snapshots,
        [drawer.id]: [
          ...(snapshots[drawer.id] || []),
          snapshot,
        ]
      },
    })
  }

  onDrawer = (drawer) => {
    this.drawers[drawer.id] = drawer
  }

  render () {
    return (
      <div>
        <ThePaintStyle/>
        <section>
          <h3>Free hand write</h3>
          <ThePaint style={{ background: 'white' }}
                    onDrawer={this.onDrawer}
                    width={'100%'}
                    onDrawStart={this.onDrawStart}
          />
        </section>

        <hr/>

        <section>
          <h3>Straight write</h3>
          <ThePaint method={'straight'}
                    style={{ background: 'white' }}
                    onDrawer={this.onDrawer}
                    width={'100%'}
                    onDrawStart={this.onDrawStart}
          />
        </section>

        <br/>

        <hr/>
        <section>
          <h3>With Image</h3>
          <ThePaint method={'straight'}
                    style={{ background: 'white' }}
                    onDrawer={this.onDrawer}
                    width={'100%'}
                    background={'data:image/gif;base64,'}
                    onDrawStart={this.onDrawStart}
          />
        </section>

        <br/>
        <hr/>
        <div>{`saved: ${Math.max(0, ...Object.values(this.state.snapshots || {}).map(({ length }) => length || 0))}`}</div>
        <button onClick={this.clear}>Clear</button>
        <button onClick={this.undo}>Undo</button>
      </div>
    )
  }
}

export default ExampleComponent

```


<!-- Section from "doc/guides/02.Usage.md.hbs" End -->

<!-- Section from "doc/guides/03.Components.md.hbs" Start -->

<a name="section-doc-guides-03-components-md"></a>

Components
-----------

### ThePaint

Hand write painting

**Props**

| Name | Type | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | ---- | ---- |
| `height` | union  |  | `150` |
| `method` | enum  | Method of drawing | `DrawingMethods.FREE` |
| `onDraw` | func  |  | `` |
| `onDrawEnd` | func  |  | `` |
| `onDrawer` | func  | Get drawer ref | `null` |
| `onDrawStart` | func  |  | `` |
| `width` | union  |  | `150` |
| `flushed` |   |  | `null` |
| `lineColor` |   |  | `'#555'` |
| `lineWidth` |   |  | `4` |

### ThePaintStyle

Style for ThePaint

**Props**

| Name | Type | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | ---- | ---- |
| `options` | object  | Style options | `{}` |
